inpath.title: Input file
inpath.description: The full path to the data file to create a mask from

outpath.title: Output folder
outpath.description: The full path to the output folder. If not provided the output will be saved to the same directory as the input file.

padding.title: Padding
padding.description: Amount to pad the mask by

minSize.title: Minimum size
minSize.description: The smallest allowable object size. Connected components smaller than the specified pixel size will be removed.

erosionRadius.title: Erosion radius
erosionRadius.description: Radius of circle to erode the sample mask by

dilationRadius.title: Dilation radius
dilationRadius.description: Radius of circle to dilate the sample mask by
